name: LinkPreview.Root

openDelay.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to delay opening the preview when hovering over the trigger.
openDelay.description_zh: 将鼠标悬停在触发器上时延迟打开预览的时间量（以毫秒为单位）。

closeDelay.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to delay closing the preview when the mouse leaves the trigger.
closeDelay.description_zh: 鼠标离开触发器时延迟关闭预览的时间量（以毫秒为单位）。

closeOnOutsideClick.description: Whether or not to close the preview when clicking outside of it.
closeOnOutsideClick.description_zh: 是否在预览外部单击时关闭预览。

closeOnEscape.description: Whether or not to close the preview when pressing the escape key.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: 按下转义键时是否关闭预览。

open.description: The open state of the link preview component.
open.description_zh: 链接预览组件的打开状态。

portal.description: Where to render the link preview when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null
portal.description_zh: 链接预览打开时呈现链接预览的位置。默认为正文。可以通过传递 null 来禁用

description: The root component used to manage the state of the state of the link preview.

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: A callback that fires when the open state changes.
events.description_zh: A callback that fires when the open state changes.

events.name: onOutsideClick
events.description: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.
events.description_zh: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.

slots.name: ids
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: 组件中元素的 ID，当您不一定希望提供自定义 ID，但仍希望访问正在分配的 ID（如果有）时，非常有用。
